doc.title: Outstanding Faculty
doc.snippet: The Annual Academic Conference invited Prof. Max Shen of the University of California, Berkeley, and Prof. Chen Lihua of the Guanghua School of Management,Peking University, Prof. Song Hua, vice president of the School of Business of Renmin University of China, as well as others to give reports to guests at home and abroad. Prof. Xiao Jianhua was invited to deliver a theme speech in the forum on the demonstration
